projects.title: SkillBuddy: Skill Tracking and Growth App
projects.description: SkillBuddy is a personal skill management app where users can add, track, and update their skills along with proficiency levels. It encourages continuous learning by keeping a record of user progress.

projects.title: FeelBeats: Emotion-Based Music Recommendation App
projects.description: FeelBeats analyzes voice input using AI-powered sentiment detection to understand the user's emotions and recommend personalized music playlists based on detected mood.

projects.title: Personal Event Manager App
projects.description: A personal event tracking Android app where users can add events, manage them with date pickers, categorize events, and receive event notifications.

projects.title: GHOST: Generative Honeypot Operations and Security Trap
projects.description: A modern cybersecurity project built during a hackathon to detect and counter cyberattacks using honeypot traps. It collects intruder details like IP and location and alerts the user in real time.

projects.title: Optimized Journeys: Solving the Traveling Salesman Problem
projects.description: A mini project solving the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) using optimization algorithms to find the shortest possible route visiting all given cities.

projects.title: Smart AI Water Dispenser
projects.description: An automatic water dispenser system powered by AI and Raspberry Pi. It detects the presence of a pet or user and dispenses water accordingly, promoting better hydration habits and reducing wastage..
